params._bribes: Array of bribe vault addresses to claim from
params._tokenId: veNFT token ID to claim for
params._tokens: Array of reward tokens to claim for each vault

params._tokenId: veNFT token ID to claim for
params._tokens: Array of fee tokens to claim

depositManaged(uint256,uint256).details: NFT will be re-locked to max time on withdrawal

params._mTokenId: Managed NFT token ID to deposit into

params.bribeVault: Address of bribe vault to check

params._stakingToken: Address of staking token for vault to disable

returns._0: Count of staking tokens with bribe vaults
Maximum number of allowed votes per voter

poke(uint256).details: Should be called after any action that affects vote weight

reset(uint256).details: Required before making changes to veNFT state

params._stakingToken: Address of staking token for vault to re-enable

params._maxVotingNum: New maximum number of allowed votes

returns._0: Total weight sum of all active votes
Address of the VE token that governs these contracts

vote(uint256,address[],uint256[]).details: Weight is allocated proportionally based on provided weights

params._stakingTokenVote: Array of staking token addresses receiving votes
params._weights: Array of weights to allocate to each token

returns._0: Total voting weight for the token

withdrawManaged(uint256).details: Withdrawing locks NFT to max lock time

bribeVaults(address).notice: Returns bribe vault address for a given staking token

claimBribes(address[],address[][],uint25.notice: Claims bribes from multiple sources for a veNFT

claimFees(address[],uint256).notice: Claims fee rewards for a veNFT

createBribeVault(address,address[]).notice: Creates new bribe vault for staking token

depositManaged(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposits veNFT into a managed NFT

epochNext(uint256).notice: Calculates start of next epoch after timestamp

epochStart(uint256).notice: Calculates start of epoch containing timestamp

epochVoteEnd(uint256).notice: Calculates end of voting window for epoch containing timestamp

epochVoteStart(uint256).notice: Calculates start of voting window for epoch containing timestamp

feeVault().notice: Returns global fee distribution vault address

isAlive(address).notice: Checks if bribe vault is active

isWhitelistedNFT(uint256).notice: Checks if NFT is whitelisted for special voting

isWhitelistedToken(address).notice: Checks if a token is whitelisted for rewards

lastVoted(uint256).notice: Returns timestamp of last vote for a token ID

length().notice: Returns number of staking tokens with active bribe vaults

maxVotingNum().notice: Returns maximum number of staking tokens one voter can vote for

poke(uint256).notice: Updates voting balances in rewards contracts for a token ID

reset(uint256).notice: Resets voting state for a token ID

setMaxVotingNum(uint256).notice: Updates maximum allowed votes per voter

totalWeight().notice: Returns total voting weight across all votes

usedWeights(uint256).notice: Returns total vote weight used by specific token ID

vote(uint256,address[],uint256[]).notice: Distributes voting weight to multiple staking tokens

votes(uint256,address).notice: Returns vote weight allocated by token ID for specific staking token

weights(address).notice: Returns total weight allocated to a staking token

whitelistNFT(uint256,bool).notice: Updates whitelist status for veNFT for privileged voting

withdrawManaged(uint256).notice: Withdraws veNFT from a managed NFT
